title: Urf + "random" figurine
body: So finally got my Urf figurine today, gotta say pretty happy with the quality of them.  But just wondering how "random" was the random figurine that came with it?  for example the FB group im in, already 4 other people have said they all got gragas with it.  would be pretty crappy if it wasnt random at all and they were just giving out gragas haha

replies.body: no it was the date you brought it, they were random but each day had a different figurine.
